title: My league of legends wont launch after the download
body: I was playing league then went off and as soon as i came back on, i had a bad image. ive tried redownloading it and it still has a bad image. what do i do?

replies.body: try to clean up your registry after you uninstall it.
Umm... Im not really into technology but just for league so could u give me a guide on how to do that? thanks :)

Something might have gone wrong with the executable file of League somehow. If you can get the client to open at all, try running a repair through the client options.

If not, go ahead and grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run a reinstall to make sure your files were all properly installed.
Thanks Sir i shall try this
